bibl.title: The Idea of Iambos.
bibl.note: Revised and expanded version of a doctoral dissertation, Hebrew University of Jerusalem. - Part One. Greek Iambos (7th - 4th cent. BCE): Genre and Corpus. - Part Two. Ways of Seeing. - Part Three. Iambos and Iambeion: A Study of Terms in Context. - Part Four. The Performance of Iambos. - Part Five. Perceptions of Iambos. - Final Remarks. Bibliography. Index.
bibl.seg: Rotstein Andrea, The Idea of Iambos.
Oxford, Oxford University Press, 2010, 8°, xviii-388 pp. ISBN 978-0-19-928627-0. £83.

Revised and expanded version of a doctoral dissertation, Hebrew University of Jerusalem. - Part One. Greek Iambos (7th - 4th cent. BCE): Genre and Corpus. - Part Two. Ways of Seeing. - Part Three. Iambos and Iambeion: A Study of Terms in Context. - Part Four. The Performance of Iambos. - Part Five. Perceptions of Iambos. - Final Remarks. Bibliography. Index.
